TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MailboxHoldStatus extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains information about an eDiscovery hold action targeting a mailbox. The class is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The constructor is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

Public Sub New (mailbox As String, status As HoldStatus, additionalInfo As String)
public: MailboxHoldStatus(System::String ^ mailbox, Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::HoldStatus status, System::String ^ additionalInfo);

Docs.param: The mailbox targeted by an eDiscovery hold action.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets the values of the target mailbox, the status of an eDiscovery hold action, and additional information about the properties of the target mailbox. The constructor is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AdditionalInfo { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets additional information about properties of the target mailbox. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Mailbox { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the target mailbox of an eDiscovery hold action. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the eDiscovery hold status of a target mailbox. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
